assessments.status_rationale: Today’s bullets contain no indication that either the House or Senate Judiciary Committee held a public hearing naming FBI Director Kash Patel in the title or in questioning re: alleged FBI political retaliation/misuse of records. Deadline is 2026-04-30, so this remains unresolved.
No bullet indicates Anthropic announced a financing round of ≥$5.0B. The OpenAI adoption-focused item is not about Anthropic financing. Deadline is 2026-06-30, so still open.

The evaluation window begins at the 2026-01-19 close and runs to 2026-06-30 close; today’s bullets provide no total-return figures for RSP vs SPY and the period is only just starting. Remains unresolved.

While multiple stories discuss a Greenland geopolitical dispute, none report DoD press releases or contract awards totaling ≥$100M for Greenland infrastructure upgrades. Deadline is 2026-09-30, so still open.

No bullet indicates the Commerce Department announced a CHIPS/semiconductor incentive award of ≥$3.0B to a Taiwan-headquartered semiconductor company for a U.S. project. Deadline is 2026-12-31, so unresolved.

Coverage references tariff threats and a ‘court loss’ context, but does not report a U.S. federal appellate court published merits decision substantively addressing legality of a major Trump-era tariff program. Deadline is 2026-12-31, so still open.
No bullet indicates UN member states adopted a final legally binding plastic pollution instrument with binding controls on production and/or product design. Deadline is 2026-12-31, so unresolved.
No bullet reports FedEx announcing an acquisition of an automation/robotics or drone-delivery company with purchase price/EV ≥$500M. Deadline is 2026-12-31, so still open.
